data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Mouscron's Marko Bakic has been booked in Genk.
In the minute 34, Mouscron take a 0-1 lead thanks to Nuno Da Costa.
Great play from Marko Bakic to set up the goal.
Alessandro Ciranni is booked for the away team.
In the minute 39, Paul Onuachu for Genk has been booked by Nicolas Laforge and receives a first yellow card.
The first-half has come to a close in Genk.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Junya Ito.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Beni Badibanga is on a sub for Fabrice Olinga for Mouscron.
Goal! Genk have got their heads in front thanks to a Theo Bongonda strike.
In the minute 61, Jorge Simao is making the team's second substitution at Luminus Arena with Charles-Andreas Brym replacing Harlem Gnohere.
Goal! Paul Onuachu extends Genk's lead to 3-1 in Genk with a header.
Deni Hocko is replacing Marko Bakic for the away team.
In the minute 79, Nuno Da Costa (Mouscron) has received a first yellow card.
John van den Brom (Genk) is making a first substitution, with Kristian Thorstvedt replacing Bryan Heynen.
Beni Badibanga (Mouscron) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 81, Great finish from Theo Bongonda to give Genk a 4-1 lead.
That's a fine assist from Junya Ito.
The home team have replaced Junya Ito with Luca Oyen. This is the second substitution made today by John van den Brom.
In the minute 86, Cyriel Dessers is replacing Paul Onuachu for Genk at Luminus Arena.
The second-half is over. The match ends 4-1.
